title: The Mystery at Ascot Estates
description: In this Dateline classic, a chilling double murder takes place in an upscale home. The evidence seems to tell a clear story, but investigators discover a marriage that’s filled with secrets, and a story that doesn’t add up. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 26, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
